action.label: Get Customer Info
action.name: Get Customer Info
action.description: Get customer information from NetSuite

parameter.description: The ID of the record to get
parameter.name: InternalID

restSimpleBinding.body: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:platformMsgs="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <soapenv:Header> <platformMsgs:passport> <platformCore:email>{$username}</platformCore:email> <platformCore:password>{$password}</platformCore:password> <platformCore:account>{$account}</platformCore:account> </platformMsgs:passport> <urn:applicationInfo xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <urn:applicationId xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$applicationId}</urn:applicationId> </urn:applicationInfo> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <platformMsgs:get> <platformMsgs:baseRef internalId="{$InternalID}" type="customer" xsi:type="platformCore:RecordRef"> <platformCore:name/> </platformMsgs:baseRef> </platformMsgs:get> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<SalesOrder xmlns:aetgt="http://schemas.informatica.com/spi/types/2013/12/spi-interface/"> <entity> <internalId>10945</internalId> </entity> <class> <internalId></internalId> </class> <terms> <internalId>7</internalId> </terms> <tranDate>2015-08-31T00:00:00.000-07:00</tranDate>
<endDate>2015-08-31T00:00:00.000-07:00</endDate> <startDate>2015-11-19T12:00:00.000-00:00</startDate> <transactionBillAddress> <billAddr1>No 22, Park Avenue Street</billAddr1> <billCity>Manchester</billCity> <billState>Connecticut</billState> <billZip>560076</billZip> <billCountry>_unitedStates</billCountry> </transactionBillAddress> <customForm> <internalId>107</internalId> </customForm> <itemList> <item xmlns:type="http://schemas.informatica.com/spi/types/2013/12/spi-interface/"> <item> <internalId>1147</internalId> </item> <description>Opportunity Description</description> <quantity>2.00</quantity> <custcol_list_price>10930.00</custcol_list_price> <rate>10930.00</rate> <custcol_monthly_perpetual_support_ren/> <custcol_product_name>AppDynamics Pro Edition - Java - 3 Year - SaaS</custcol_product_name> <custcol_volume_discount_percent>0.00</custcol_volume_discount_percent> <price> <internalId>-1</internalId> </price> <custcol_months>1</custcol_months> <custcol_subscription_duration>None</custcol_subscription_duration> <custcol_total_price>21860.00</custcol_total_price> <amount>21860.00</amount> <custcol_qty>2</custcol_qty> <custcol_line_type>New</custcol_line_type> </item> </itemList> <departmentList> <department xmlns:type="http://schemas.informatica.com/spi/types/2013/12/spi-interface/"> <department> <internalId>3</internalId> <name>Sales</name> </department> </department> </departmentList> </SalesOrder>

parameter.description: Process Object containing Sales Order Header Custom Field information.

parameter.name: NSHeaderCustomFields

restSimpleBinding.body:
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:platformCommon="urn:common_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:platformMsgs="urn:messepages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:tranSales="urn:sales_2018_1.transactions.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <soap:Header>
    <platformMsgs:passport>
      <platformCore:email>{$username}</platformCore:email>
      <platformCore:password>{$password}</platformCore:password>
      <platformCore:account>{$account}</platformCore:account>     
    </platformMsgs:passport>
	<urn:applicationInfo xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
       <urn:applicationId xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$applicationId}</urn:applicationId>
    </urn:applicationInfo>
  </soap:Header>
  <soap:Body>
    <platformMsgs:add>
      <platformMsgs:record xsi:type="tranSales:SalesOrder">
        <tranSales:customForm internalId="{$SalesOrder//customForm/internalId/text()}" />
        <tranSales:entity internalId="{$SalesOrder//entity/internalId/text()}" />
		{
		    if(exists($SalesOrder//salesRep/internalId))
               then
            <tranSales:salesRep internalId="{$SalesOrder//salesRep/internalId/text()}" />
            else ()
		}
        <tranSales:subsidiary internalId="{$SalesOrder//subsidiary/internalId/data()}" />
		{
		 if(exists($SalesOrder/tranDate/text()))
		 then
		 <tranSales:tranDate>{$SalesOrder/tranDate/text()}</tranSales:tranDate>
		 else()
		}
		{
		  if(exists($SalesOrder/startDate/text()))
		  then
		  <tranSales:startDate xsi:type="xsd:dateTime">{$SalesOrder/startDate/text()}</tranSales:startDate>
		  else()
		}
        {
		  if(exists($SalesOrder/endDate/text()))
		  then
		  <tranSales:endDate xsi:type="xsd:dateTime">{$SalesOrder/endDate/text()}</tranSales:endDate>
		  else()
		}
	    {
        if(exists($SalesOrder/otherRefNum/text()))
               then
           <tranSales:otherRefNum>{$SalesOrder/otherRefNum/text()}</tranSales:otherRefNum>
            else ()
		}
        {
        if(exists($SalesOrder/class/internalId/text()))
        then
        <tranSales:class internalId="{$SalesOrder//class/internalId/text()}">
               </tranSales:class>
        else ()
        }
        
         {
        if(exists($SalesOrder/memo/text()))
               then
           <tranSales:memo>{$SalesOrder/memo/text()}</tranSales:memo>
            else ()
		}
               
        {
        if(exists($SalesOrder/terms/internalId/text()))
        then
        <tranSales:terms internalId="{$SalesOrder//terms/internalId/text()}">
               </tranSales:terms>
        else ()
        } 
                
        <tranSales:billingAddress>
          <platformCommon:addressee>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billAddressee/text()}</platformCommon:addressee>
          <platformCommon:addr1>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billAddr1/text()}</platformCommon:addr1>
          <platformCommon:city>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billCity/text()}</platformCommon:city>
          <platformCommon:state>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billState/text()}</platformCommon:state>
          <platformCommon:zip>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billZip/text()}</platformCommon:zip>
          <platformCommon:country>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billCountry/text()}</platformCommon:country>
        </tranSales:billingAddress>
        <tranSales:shippingAddress>
          <platformCommon:addressee>{$SalesOrder/transactionShipAddress/shipAddressee/text()}</platformCommon:addressee>
          <platformCommon:addr1>{$SalesOrder/transactionShipAddress/shipAddr1/text()}</platformCommon:addr1>
          <platformCommon:city>{$SalesOrder/transactionShipAddress/shipCity/text()}</platformCommon:city>
          <platformCommon:state>{$SalesOrder/transactionShipAddress/shipState/text()}</platformCommon:state>
          <platformCommon:zip>{$SalesOrder/transactionShipAddress/shipZip/text()}</platformCommon:zip>
          <platformCommon:country>{$SalesOrder/transactionShipAddress/shipCountry/text()}</platformCommon:country>
        </tranSales:shippingAddress>
        <tranSales:itemList>
          {

                        for $i at $pos in ($SalesOrder/itemList/item)
                        return
          <tranSales:item>
            <tranSales:item internalId="{$i/item/internalId/text()}" />
            {
                        if(exists($i/quantity))
                        then
            <tranSales:quantity>{$i/quantity/data()}</tranSales:quantity>
            else ()
                        }
            {
            			if(exists($i/description))
            			then
            <tranSales:description>{$i/description/data()}</tranSales:description>
            else ()
            			}
            {
                        if(exists($i/amount))
            			then
            <tranSales:amount>{$i/amount/data()}</tranSales:amount> 
            else ()
            			}
             {
                        if(exists($i/rate))
            			then
            <tranSales:rate>{$i/rate/data()}</tranSales:rate>
            else ()
            			}
            
            
            { 
            if(exists($i/custcol_months/text()))
            then   
            <tranSales:revRecTermInMonths>{$i/custcol_months/text()}</tranSales:revRecTermInMonths>
            else ()
            }
            {
                        if(exists($i/price/internalId))
            			then
			<tranSales:price internalId="{$i/price/internalId/data()}"></tranSales:price>
            else ()
            			}
            <tranSales:line>{$pos}</tranSales:line>
			{
            if(exists($i/billingSchedule/internalId/text()))
            then
            <tranSales:billingSchedule internalId="{$i/billingSchedule/internalId/text()}">
               </tranSales:billingSchedule>
             else ()
             }
			<tranSales:customFieldList>
              {
                        if(exists($i/custcol_list_price/text()))
                        then
			  <platformCore:customField internalId="1244" scriptId="custcol_list_price" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_list_price/data()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              			}
              {
              
              if(exists($i/custcol_qty/text()))
                        then
			  <platformCore:customField internalId="184" scriptId="custcol_qty" xsi:type="platformCore:LongCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_qty/data()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              			}
              {
              			if(exists($i/custcol_one_time_discount_percent/text()))
                        then
              <platformCore:customField internalId="1239" scriptId="custcol_one_time_discount_percent" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_one_time_discount_percent/data()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              			}
              {
              			if(exists($i/custcol_total_price/text()))
                        then
              <platformCore:customField internalId="1249" scriptId="custcol_total_price" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_total_price/data()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              			}
			  {
              if(exists($i/custcol_monthly_perpetual_support_ren/text()))
                        then
              <platformCore:customField internalId="1245" scriptId="custcol_monthly_perpetual_support_ren" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_monthly_perpetual_support_ren/data()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              			}
			  {
              			if(exists($i/custcol_months/text()))
                        then
              <platformCore:customField internalId="1246" scriptId="custcol_months" xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_months/data()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              			}	
			  {
              			if(exists($i/custcol_product_name/text()))
                        then
              <platformCore:customField internalId="1247" scriptId="custcol_product_name" xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_product_name/data()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              			}	
			  {
              			if(exists($i/custcol_subscription_duration/text()))
                        then
              <platformCore:customField internalId="1248" scriptId="custcol_subscription_duration" xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_subscription_duration/data()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              			}	
			  {
              			if(exists($i/custcol_volume_discount_percent/text()))
                        then
              <platformCore:customField internalId="1250" scriptId="custcol_volume_discount_percent" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_volume_discount_percent/data()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              			}
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_line_type/text()))
              then
              <platformCore:customField internalId="2680" scriptId="custcol_line_type " xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_line_type/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_so_line_start_date/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="2790" scriptId="custcol_so_line_start_date" xsi:type="platformCore:DateCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_so_line_start_date/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_so_line_end_date/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="2791" scriptId="custcol_so_line_end_date" xsi:type="platformCore:DateCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_so_line_end_date/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_coterm_oppty_id/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="2792" scriptId="custcol_coterm_oppty_id" xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_coterm_oppty_id/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_one_time_disc_amt/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="2794" scriptId="custcol_one_time_disc_amt" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_one_time_disc_amt/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_ext_list_price/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="2808" scriptId="custcol_ext_list_price" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_ext_list_price/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_monthly_ext_list_price/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="2809" scriptId="custcol_monthly_ext_list_price" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_monthly_ext_list_price/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_monthly_list_unit_price/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="2810" scriptId="custcol_monthly_list_unit_price" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_monthly_list_unit_price/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_sfdc_order_line_id/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="3010" scriptId="custcol_sfdc_order_line_id" xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_sfdc_order_line_id/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_sfdc_parent_line_id/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="3018" scriptId="custcol_sfdc_parent_line_id" xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_sfdc_parent_line_id/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_acceptance_language/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="3022" scriptId="custcol_acceptance_language" xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_acceptance_language/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(fn:string-length($i/custcol_expiry_date/text())>0)
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="3020" scriptId="custcol_expiry_date" xsi:type="platformCore:DateCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_expiry_date/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_referral_fee/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="3019" scriptId="custcol_referral_fee" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_referral_fee/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_contract_mod_opp_id/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="2853" scriptId="custcol_contract_mod_opp_id" xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_contract_mod_opp_id/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }              
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_bill_in_arrears/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField scriptId="custcol_bill_in_arrears" xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_bill_in_arrears/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
                 if(exists($i/custcol_swap_rights_line/text()))
                        then
					<platformCore:customField 
                                            scriptId="custcol_swap_rights_line"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_swap_rights_line/text()}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				else ()
				}
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_ad_burstable_months/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField scriptId="custcol_ad_burstable_months" xsi:type="platformCore:LongCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_ad_burstable_months/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_oem_cos_percent/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField scriptId="custcol_oem_cos_percent" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_oem_cos_percent/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              {
              if(exists($i/custcol_referral_percent/text()))
              then
               <platformCore:customField scriptId="custcol_referral_percent" xsi:type="platformCore:DoubleCustomFieldRef">
                           <platformCore:value>{$i/custcol_referral_percent/text()}</platformCore:value>
              </platformCore:customField>
              else ()
              }
              
			</tranSales:customFieldList>			
          </tranSales:item>
          }
        </tranSales:itemList>
        
        <tranSales:customFieldList xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
		{
		if(exists($NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_sfdc_start_date/text()))
                        then
                  <platformCore:customField internalId="1237"
                                            scriptId="custbody_sfdc_start_date"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:DateCustomFieldRef">
                    <platformCore:value>{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_sfdc_start_date/text()}</platformCore:value>					
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else ()
        }	
		{
		if(exists($NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_opportunity_record_type/text()))
                        then
		<platformCore:customField internalId="1236"
                                            scriptId="custbody_opportunity_record_type"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_opportunity_record_type/text()}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
		          else ()
		}
                  
        {
		if(exists($NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_contract_start_date/text()))
                        then
		<platformCore:customField internalId="200"
                                            scriptId="custbody_contract_start_date"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:DateCustomFieldRef">
                    <platformCore:value>{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_contract_start_date/text()}</platformCore:value>
        </platformCore:customField>
		          else ()
        }
                  {
				  if(exists($NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_license_term_in_months/text()))
                        then
				  <platformCore:customField internalId="1232"
                                            scriptId="custbody_license_term_in_months"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:LongCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_license_term_in_months/text()}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else ()

                  {

                        then

                                            scriptId="custbody_salesforce_currency"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_salesforce_currency/text()}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else ()
				  }
                  {
				  if(exists($NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_order_type/text()))
                        then
				  <platformCore:customField internalId="179"
                                            scriptId="custbody_order_type"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:SelectCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value internalId="{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_order_type/text()}" />
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else ()

                 {
				 if(exists($NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_netsuite_entity/text()))
                        then
				  <platformCore:customField internalId="1231"
                                            scriptId="custbody_netsuite_entity"

                     <platformCore:value internalId="{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_netsuite_entity/text()}" />
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else ()

                  {

                        then
				  <platformCore:customField internalId="177"
                                            scriptId="custbody_end_user"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:SelectCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value internalId="{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_end_user/text()}" />
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else ()
				  }
                  {
				  if(exists($NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_opportunity_name/text()))
                        then
				  <platformCore:customField internalId="1235"
                                            scriptId="custbody_opportunity_name"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_opportunity_name/text()}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else ()
				  }
                  {
				  if(exists($NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_type/text()))
                        then
				  <platformCore:customField internalId="1238"
                                            scriptId="custbody_type"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_type/text()}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else ()
				  }              
                  {

                        then

                     <platformCore:value internalId="{$NSHeaderCustomFields/*:custbody_channel_tier/text()}" />
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else ()

field.description: Internal ID number for Sales Order returned by Netsuite
field.name: NSinternalID

action.label: Update Customer Info
action.name: Update Customer Info
action.description: Update Company Details on NetSuite Account

parameter.description: The ID of the Account to Update
parameter.label: NetSuite ID
parameter.name: InternalID

restSimpleBinding.body:
<Envelope xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
          xmlns:platformMsgs="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"
          xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
          xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
          xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
          xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"
		  xmlns:platformCommon="urn:common_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
   <Header>
      <passport xmlns="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
         <email xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$username}</email>
         <password xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$password}</password>
         <account xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$account}</account>         
      </passport>
	  <urn:applicationInfo xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
          <urn:applicationId xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$applicationId}</urn:applicationId>
      </urn:applicationInfo>
   </Header>
   <Body>
      <update xmlns="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
        <record internalId="{$InternalID}" xsi:type="listRel:Customer" xmlns:listRel="urn:relationships_2018_1.lists.webservices.netsuite.com">
          { if ($IsPerson != '')
               then
                  <listRel:isPerson>{$IsPerson}</listRel:isPerson>
               else ()
          }  
          { if ($NewPhoneNumber != '')
               then
                  <listRel:phone>{$NewPhoneNumber}</listRel:phone>
               else ()
          }
		  		  { 
		if ($fax != '')
               then
                  <listRel:fax>{$fax}</listRel:fax>
               else ()
          }
		  { 
		if ($Url != '')
               then
                  <listRel:url>{$Url}</listRel:url>
               else 
          <listRel:url></listRel:url>
          } 
          {
		  if ($email  != '')
               then
			<listRel:email>{$email}</listRel:email> 
			   else ()
           } 
		  {
		  if ($companyName != '')
               then
                  <listRel:companyName>{$companyName}</listRel:companyName>
               else ()
          }
          {
		  if ($parentNSId != '')
               then
          <listRel:parent internalId="{$parentNSId}"/>
               else ()
          }
                    {
		  if ($currencyNSId != '')
               then
          <listRel:currency internalId="{$currencyNSId}"/>
               else ()
          }
          
		  {
		  if ($entityId != '')
               then
                  <listRel:entityId>{$entityId}</listRel:entityId>
               else ()
          }
          {
          if($Subsidiary != '')
          		then
          
          	<listRel:subsidiary xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"
                                   internalId="{$Subsidiary}" />
          		else ()
          }					   
		  {
		    if(exists($taxItem))
			then
			 <listRel:taxItem xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"
                                   internalId="{$taxItem}" /> 
			else()
		  
		  }
		  
								   
		   <listRel:addressbookList replaceAll="true">
		   {
		    if(exists($billingAddress))
			then
			  
                if (exists($billingAddress/*:billingAddress1/text()) or exists($billingAddress/*:billingAddress2/text()) or exists($billingAddress/*:billingCity/text())
				or exists($billingAddress/*:billingState/text()) or exists($billingAddress/*:billingZip/text()) or exists($billingAddress/*:billingCountry/text())) 
				then
                        <listRel:addressbook>
                            {
                            if(exists($shippingAddress))
			 				then
                            <listRel:defaultShipping>false</listRel:defaultShipping>
                            else 
                            <listRel:defaultShipping>true</listRel:defaultShipping>
                            }
                            <listRel:defaultBilling>true</listRel:defaultBilling>
                            <listRel:addressbookAddress>
                                <platformCommon:addr1>{$billingAddress/*:billingAddress1/text()}</platformCommon:addr1>
								{
                                if (exists($billingAddress/*:billingAddress2/text())) then
                                    <platformCommon:addr2>{$billingAddress/*:billingAddress2/text()}</platformCommon:addr2>
                                else()
								}
                                <platformCommon:city>{$billingAddress/*:billingCity/text()}</platformCommon:city>
                                <platformCommon:zip>{$billingAddress/*:billingZip/text()}</platformCommon:zip>
                                <platformCommon:country>{$billingAddress/*:billingCountry/text()}</platformCommon:country>
								{
                                if (exists($billingAddress/*:billingState/text())) then
                                    <platformCommon:state>{$billingAddress/*:billingState/text()}</platformCommon:state>
                                else()
								}
								<platformCommon:addressee>{$billingAddress/*:billingAddressee/text()}</platformCommon:addressee>
                            </listRel:addressbookAddress>
                        </listRel:addressbook>
                    
                else()
            
			else()
		   }

		   {
		     if(exists($shippingAddress))
			 then
			             
                if (exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress1/text()) or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress2/text()) or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingCity/text())
				or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingState/text()) or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingZip/text()) or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingCountry/text())) then
                        <listRel:addressbook>
                            <listRel:defaultShipping>true</listRel:defaultShipping>
                            <listRel:defaultBilling>false</listRel:defaultBilling>
                            <listRel:addressbookAddress>
                                <platformCommon:addr1>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress1/text()}</platformCommon:addr1>
								{
                                if (exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress2)) then
                                    <platformCommon:addr2>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress2/text()}</platformCommon:addr2>
                                else()
								}
                                <platformCommon:city>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingCity/text()}</platformCommon:city>
                                <platformCommon:zip>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingZip/text()}</platformCommon:zip>
                                <platformCommon:country>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingCountry/text()}</platformCommon:country>
								{
                                if (exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingState)) then
                                    <platformCommon:state>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingState/text()}</platformCommon:state>
                                else()
								}
								<platformCommon:addressee>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingAddressee/text()}</platformCommon:addressee>
                            </listRel:addressbookAddress>
                        </listRel:addressbook>
             else()
            
			 else()
		   }

            </listRel:addressbookList>      
<listRel:customFieldList xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
			  {
			    if(exists($accountID))
				then
				    <platformCore:customField internalId="1222" scriptId="custentity_celigo_ns_sfdc_sync_id"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$accountID}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				else()			  
			  }
			  {
			    if($email  != '')
				then
				    <platformCore:customField scriptId="custentity_ad_inv_via_email"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>T</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				else()			  
			  }
			  {
			    if(exists($industry))
				then
               <platformCore:customField internalId="2676"
                                            scriptId="custentity_industry"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$industry}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else()			  
			  }
			  {
			    if(exists($parentCustomer_uniqueId))
				then
                <platformCore:customField scriptId="custentity_ad_parent_cust_unique_id"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$parentCustomer_uniqueId}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				  else()			  
			  }
              </listRel:customFieldList>
        </record>
      </update>
   </Body>
</Envelope>

restSimpleBinding.body: <Envelope xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:platformMsgs="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <Header> <passport xmlns="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <email xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$username}</email> <password xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$password}</password> <account xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$account}</account> </passport> <urn:applicationInfo xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <urn:applicationId xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$applicationId}</urn:applicationId> </urn:applicationInfo> </Header> <Body> <get xmlns="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <baseRef internalId="{$InternalID}" type="salesOrder" xsi:type="platformCore:RecordRef"> <name xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"/> </baseRef> </get> </Body> </Envelope>

field.description: The full NetSuite Sales Order record as a Process Object.
field.name: NSsalesOrder
field.xquery:
<SalesOrder>
{
  let $elem := //*:record 
  return
    for $c1 in ($elem/@*, $elem/*) return
      element { local-name($c1) }
      {
        if (not($c1/*)) then
          data($c1)
        else for $c2 in ($c1/@*, $c1/*) return
          element { local-name($c2) }
          { 
            if (not($c2/*)) then
              data($c2)
            else for $c3 in ($c2/@*, $c2/*) return
              element { local-name($c3) }
              { 
                if (not($c3/*)) then
                  data($c3)
                else for $c4 in ($c3/@*, $c3/*) return
                  element { local-name($c4) }
                  { 
                    if (not($c4/*)) then
                      data($c4)
                    else for $c5 in ($c4/@*, $c4/*) return
                      element { local-name($c5) }
                      { 
                        if (not($c5/*)) then
                          data($c5)
                        else for $c6 in ($c5/@*, $c5/*) return
                          element { local-name($c6) }
                          { 
                            if (not($c6/*)) then
                              data($c6)
                            else for $c7 in ($c6/@*, $c6/*) return
                              element { local-name($c7) }
                              {
                                $c7/@*, 
                                $c7/*, 
                                $c7/text()
                              }
                          }
                      }
                  }
              }
          }
      }
 }
</SalesOrder>

restSimpleBinding.body:
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:platformCommon="urn:common_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:platformMsgs="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:tranSales="urn:sales_2018_1.transactions.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soap:Header> <platformMsgs:passport> <platformCore:email>{$username}</platformCore:email> <platformCore:password>{$password}</platformCore:password> <platformCore:account>{$account}</platformCore:account> </platformMsgs:passport> <urn:applicationInfo xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <urn:applicationId xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$applicationId}</urn:applicationId> </urn:applicationInfo> </soap:Header> <soap:Body> <platformMsgs:update> <platformMsgs:record xsi:type="tranSales:SalesOrder" internalId="{$ExistingNetSuiteId}"> <tranSales:customForm internalId="{$SalesOrder//customForm/internalId/text()}" /> <tranSales:entity internalId="{$SalesOrder//entity/internalId/text()}" /> <tranSales:currency internalId="{$SalesOrder//currency/internalId/text()}" /> <tranSales:salesRep internalId="{$SalesOrder//salesRep/internalId/text()}" /> <tranSales:terms internalId="{$SalesOrder//terms/internalId/data()}" /> <tranSales:location internalId="{$SalesOrder//location/internalId/data()}" /> <tranSales:subsidiary internalId="{$SalesOrder//subsidiary/internalId/data()}" /> <tranSales:tranDate>{$SalesOrder/tranDate/text()}</tranSales:tranDate> <tranSales:otherRefNum>{$SalesOrder/otherRefNum/text()}</tranSales:otherRefNum> <tranSales:billingAddress> <platformCommon:addr1>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billAddr1/text()}</platformCommon:addr1> <platformCommon:city>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billCity/text()}</platformCommon:city> <platformCommon:state>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billState/text()}</platformCommon:state> <platformCommon:zip>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billZip/text()}</platformCommon:zip> <platformCommon:country>_unitedStates</platformCommon:country> </tranSales:billingAddress> <tranSales:itemList> {
for $i at $pos in ($SalesOrder/itemList/item) return <tranSales:item> <tranSales:item internalId="{$i/item/internalId/text()}" /> { if(exists($i/quantity)) then <tranSales:quantity>{$i/quantity/data()}</tranSales:quantity> else () } <tranSales:description>{$i/description/data()}</tranSales:description> <tranSales:amount>{$i/amount/data()}</tranSales:amount> <tranSales:line>{$pos}</tranSales:line> </tranSales:item> } </tranSales:itemList> <tranSales:customFieldList> { for $c in ($SalesOrder/customFieldList/customField) return <platformCore:customField internalId="{$c/internalId/text()}" xsi:type="{$c/type/text()}"> { if (($c/type/text() = "platformCore:SelectCustomFieldRef") and (exists($c/valueSelect))) then <platformCore:value internalId="{$c/valueSelect/internalId/text()}" typeId="{$c/valueSelect/typeId/text()}"> <platformCore:name>{$c/valueSelect/name/text()}</platformCore:name> </platformCore:value> else if ($c/type/text() = "platformCore:SelectCustomFieldRef") then <platformCore:value internalId="{$c/value/internalId/text()}" typeId="{$c/value/typeId/text()}"> <platformCore:name>{$c/value/name/text()}</platformCore:name> </platformCore:value> else <platformCore:value>{$c/value/data()}</platformCore:value> } </platformCore:customField> } </tranSales:customFieldList> </platformMsgs:record> </platformMsgs:update> <orig>{$SalesOrder}</orig> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

action.label: Create Customer
action.name: Create Customer
action.description: Create New Customer Record in Netsuite and return Netsuite Customer ID

restSimpleBinding.body:
<Envelope xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns1="urn:relationships_2018_1.lists.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:ns2="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:ns3="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:ns4="ns" xmlns:ns6="urn:common_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
   <Header>
      <passport xsi:type="Passport">
         <email>{$username}</email>
         <password>{$password}</password>
         <account>{$account}</account>         
      </passport>
	  <urn:applicationInfo xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
        <urn:applicationId xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$applicationId}</urn:applicationId>
      </urn:applicationInfo>
   </Header>
   <Body>
      <add>
         <record xmlns:listRel="urn:relationships_2018_1.lists.webservices.netsuite.com"
                 xsi:type="ns1:Customer">
            <ns1:isPerson>false</ns1:isPerson>
            <ns1:companyName>{$companyName}</ns1:companyName>
			{
		  if ($email  != '')
               then
			<ns1:email>{$email}</ns1:email> 
			   else ()
           } 
            <ns1:entityId>{$Customer_uniqueId}</ns1:entityId>
           {
		  if ($parentNSId != '')
               then
          <listRel:parent internalId="{$parentNSId}"/>
               else ()
          } 
           <ns1:phone>{$phone}</ns1:phone>
            <ns1:fax>{$fax}</ns1:fax>
             <ns1:url>{$url}</ns1:url>
			 {
			  if(exists($subsidiary))
			  then
			  <ns1:subsidiary internalId="{$subsidiary}" />			              
			  else()
			 }
           {
           if(exists($taxItem))
             then
            <ns1:taxItem internalId="{$taxItem}"/>
             else()
           }

			 <ns1:addressbookList replaceAll="true">
            {
                if (exists($billingAddress/*:billingAddress1/text()) or exists($billingAddress/*:billingAddress2/text()) or exists($billingAddress/*:billingCity/text())
				or exists($billingAddress/*:billingState/text()) or exists($billingAddress/*:billingZip/text()) or exists($billingAddress/*:billingCountry/text())) 
				then
                        <ns1:addressbook>
                            <ns1:defaultShipping>false</ns1:defaultShipping>
                            <ns1:defaultBilling>true</ns1:defaultBilling>
                            <ns1:addressbookAddress>
                                <ns6:addr1>{$billingAddress/*:billingAddress1/text()}</ns6:addr1>
								{
                                if (exists($billingAddress/*:billingAddress2/text())) then
                                    <ns6:addr2>{$billingAddress/*:billingAddress2/text()}</ns6:addr2>
                                else()
								}
                                <ns6:city>{$billingAddress/*:billingCity/text()}</ns6:city>
                                <ns6:zip>{$billingAddress/*:billingZip/text()}</ns6:zip>
                                <ns6:country>{$billingAddress/*:billingCountry/text()}</ns6:country>
								{
                                if (exists($billingAddress/*:billingState/text())) then
                                    <ns6:state>{$billingAddress/*:billingState/text()}</ns6:state>
                                else()
								}
								<ns6:addressee>{$billingAddress/*:billingAddressee/text()}</ns6:addressee>
                            </ns1:addressbookAddress>
                        </ns1:addressbook>
                    
                else()
            }
            {
                if (exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress1/text()) or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress2/text()) or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingCity/text())
				or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingState/text()) or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingZip/text()) or exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingCountry/text())) 
				then
                        <ns1:addressbook>
                            <ns1:defaultShipping>true</ns1:defaultShipping>
                            <ns1:defaultBilling>false</ns1:defaultBilling>
                            <ns1:addressbookAddress>
                                <ns6:addr1>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress1/text()}</ns6:addr1>
								{
                                if (exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress2/text())) then
                                    <ns6:addr2>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingAddress2/text()}</ns6:addr2>
                                else()
								}
                                <ns6:city>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingCity/text()}</ns6:city>
                                <ns6:zip>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingZip/text()}</ns6:zip>
                                <ns6:country>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingCountry/text()}</ns6:country>
								{
                                if (exists($shippingAddress/*:shippingState/text())) then
                                    <ns6:state>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingState/text()}</ns6:state>
                                else()
								}
								<ns6:addressee>{$shippingAddress/*:shippingAddressee/text()}</ns6:addressee>
                            </ns1:addressbookAddress>
                        </ns1:addressbook>
             else()
            }
            </ns1:addressbookList>      

		      <listRel:customFieldList xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
			  {
			    if(exists($accountID))
				then
				    <platformCore:customField internalId="1222" scriptId="custentity_celigo_ns_sfdc_sync_id"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$accountID}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				else()			  
			  }
              {
			    if($email  != '')
				then
				    <platformCore:customField scriptId="custentity_ad_inv_via_email"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>T</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
				else()			  
			  }
                 <platformCore:customField internalId="2676"
                                            scriptId="custentity_industry"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$industry}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
                  <platformCore:customField scriptId="custentity_ad_parent_cust_unique_id"
                                            xsi:type="platformCore:StringCustomFieldRef">
                     <platformCore:value>{$parentCustomer_uniqueId}</platformCore:value>
                  </platformCore:customField>
              </listRel:customFieldList>            
           
         </record>
      </add>
   </Body>
</Envelope>

restSimpleBinding.body: <Envelope xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:platformMsgs="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <Header> <passport xmlns="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <email xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$username}</email> <password xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$password}</password> <account xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$account}</account> </passport> <urn:applicationInfo xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <urn:applicationId xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$applicationId}</urn:applicationId> </urn:applicationInfo> </Header> <Body> <get xmlns="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <baseRef internalId="{$InternalID}" type="invoice" xsi:type="platformCore:RecordRef"> <name xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"/> </baseRef> </get> </Body> </Envelope>

field.name: NSinvoice
field.xquery:
<Invoice>
{
  let $elem := //*:record 
  return
    for $c1 in ($elem/@*, $elem/*) return
      element { local-name($c1) }
      {
        if (not($c1/*)) then
          data($c1)
        else for $c2 in ($c1/@*, $c1/*) return
          element { local-name($c2) }
          { 
            if (not($c2/*)) then
              data($c2)
            else for $c3 in ($c2/@*, $c2/*) return
              element { local-name($c3) }
              { 
                if (not($c3/*)) then
                  data($c3)
                else for $c4 in ($c3/@*, $c3/*) return
                  element { local-name($c4) }
                  { 
                    if (not($c4/*)) then
                      data($c4)
                    else for $c5 in ($c4/@*, $c4/*) return
                      element { local-name($c5) }
                      { 
                        if (not($c5/*)) then
                          data($c5)
                        else for $c6 in ($c5/@*, $c5/*) return
                          element { local-name($c6) }
                          { 
                            if (not($c6/*)) then
                              data($c6)
                            else for $c7 in ($c6/@*, $c6/*) return
                              element { local-name($c7) }
                              {
                                $c7/@*, 
                                $c7/*, 
                                $c7/text()
                              }
                          }
                      }
                  }
              }
          }
      }
 }
</Invoice>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:platformCommon="urn:common_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:platformMsgs="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:tranSales="urn:sales_2018_1.transactions.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soap:Header> <platformMsgs:passport> <platformCore:email>{$username}</platformCore:email> <platformCore:password>{$password}</platformCore:password> <platformCore:account>{$account}</platformCore:account> </platformMsgs:passport> <urn:applicationInfo xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <urn:applicationId xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$applicationId}</urn:applicationId> </urn:applicationInfo> </soap:Header> <soap:Body> <platformMsgs:add> <platformMsgs:record xsi:type="tranSales:SalesOrder"> <tranSales:customForm internalId="{$SalesOrder//customForm/internalId/text()}" /> <tranSales:entity internalId="{$SalesOrder//entity/internalId/text()}" /> <tranSales:currency internalId="{$SalesOrder//currency/internalId/text()}" /> <tranSales:salesRep internalId="{$SalesOrder//salesRep/internalId/text()}" /> <tranSales:terms internalId="{$SalesOrder//terms/internalId/data()}" /> <tranSales:location internalId="{$SalesOrder//location/internalId/data()}" /> <tranSales:subsidiary internalId="{$SalesOrder//subsidiary/internalId/data()}" /> <tranSales:tranDate>{$SalesOrder/tranDate/text()}</tranSales:tranDate> <tranSales:otherRefNum>{$SalesOrder/otherRefNum/text()}</tranSales:otherRefNum> <tranSales:billingAddress> <platformCommon:addr1>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billAddr1/text()}</platformCommon:addr1> <platformCommon:city>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billCity/text()}</platformCommon:city> <platformCommon:state>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billState/text()}</platformCommon:state> <platformCommon:zip>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billZip/text()}</platformCommon:zip> <platformCommon:country>_unitedStates</platformCommon:country> </tranSales:billingAddress> <tranSales:itemList> {
for $i at $pos in ($SalesOrder/itemList/item) return <tranSales:item> <tranSales:item internalId="{$i/item/internalId/text()}" /> { if(exists($i/quantity)) then <tranSales:quantity>{$i/quantity/data()}</tranSales:quantity> else () } <tranSales:description>{$i/description/data()}</tranSales:description> <tranSales:amount>{$i/amount/data()}</tranSales:amount> <tranSales:line>{$pos}</tranSales:line> </tranSales:item> } </tranSales:itemList> <tranSales:customFieldList> { for $c in ($SalesOrder/customFieldList/customField) return <platformCore:customField internalId="{$c/internalId/text()}" xsi:type="{$c/type/text()}"> { if (($c/type/text() = "platformCore:SelectCustomFieldRef") and (exists($c/valueSelect))) then <platformCore:value internalId="{$c/valueSelect/internalId/text()}" typeId="{$c/valueSelect/typeId/text()}"> <platformCore:name>{$c/valueSelect/name/text()}</platformCore:name> </platformCore:value> else if ($c/type/text() = "platformCore:SelectCustomFieldRef") then <platformCore:value internalId="{$c/value/internalId/text()}" typeId="{$c/value/typeId/text()}"> <platformCore:name>{$c/value/name/text()}</platformCore:name> </platformCore:value> else <platformCore:value>{$c/value/data()}</platformCore:value> } </platformCore:customField> } </tranSales:customFieldList> </platformMsgs:record> </platformMsgs:add> <orig>{$SalesOrder}</orig> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

restSimpleBinding.body:
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:platformCommon="urn:common_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:platformCore="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:platformMsgs="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:tranSales="urn:sales_2018_1.transactions.webservices.netsuite.com" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <soap:Header>
    <platformMsgs:passport>
      <platformCore:email>{$username}</platformCore:email>
      <platformCore:password>{$password}</platformCore:password>
      <platformCore:account>{$account}</platformCore:account>
    </platformMsgs:passport>
	<urn:applicationInfo xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">
        <urn:applicationId xmlns:urn="urn:messages_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com">{$applicationId}</urn:applicationId>
    </urn:applicationInfo>
  </soap:Header>
  <soap:Body>
    <platformMsgs:update>
      <platformMsgs:record xsi:type="tranSales:SalesOrder" internalId="{$NetSuiteId}">
        <tranSales:customForm internalId="{$SalesOrder//customForm/internalId/text()}" />
        <tranSales:entity internalId="{$SalesOrder//entity/internalId/text()}" />
		{
		    if(exists($SalesOrder//salesRep/internalId))
               then
            <tranSales:salesRep internalId="{$SalesOrder//salesRep/internalId/text()}" />
            else ()
		}
        <tranSales:subsidiary internalId="{$SalesOrder//subsidiary/internalId/data()}" />
		{
		 if(exists($SalesOrder/tranDate/text()))
		 then
		 <tranSales:tranDate>{$SalesOrder/tranDate/text()}</tranSales:tranDate>
		 else()
		}
		{
		  if(exists($SalesOrder/startDate/text()))
		  then
		  <tranSales:startDate xsi:type="xsd:dateTime">{$SalesOrder/startDate/text()}</tranSales:startDate>
		  else()
		}
        {
		  if(exists($SalesOrder/endDate/text()))
		  then
		  <tranSales:endDate xsi:type="xsd:dateTime">{$SalesOrder/endDate/text()}</tranSales:endDate>
		  else()
		}
		
		
				{
		    if(exists($SalesOrder/otherRefNum))
               then
           <tranSales:otherRefNum>{$SalesOrder/otherRefNum/text()}</tranSales:otherRefNum>
            else ()
		}
        <tranSales:billingAddress>
          <platformCommon:addr1>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billAddr1/text()}</platformCommon:addr1>
          <platformCommon:city>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billCity/text()}</platformCommon:city>
          <platformCommon:state>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billState/text()}</platformCommon:state>
          <platformCommon:zip>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billZip/text()}</platformCommon:zip>
          <platformCommon:country>{$SalesOrder/transactionBillAddress/billCountry/text()}</platformCommon:country>
        </tranSales:billingAddress>
        <tranSales:itemList>
          {

                        for $i at $pos in ($SalesOrder/itemList/item)
                        return
          <tranSales:item>
            <tranSales:item internalId="{$i/item/internalId/text()}" />
            {
                        if(exists($i/quantity))
                        then
            <tranSales:quantity>{$i/quantity/data()}</tranSales:quantity>
            else ()
                        }

</recordType> </basic> </criteria> </searchRecord> </search> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
